settings.title: Can anyone use your products?
settings.answer: Our products are suitable for all skin types! They’re dermatologist tested, hypoallergenic, sulphate + paraben-free.

settings.title: Will you be adding new products?
settings.answer: Yes! We hope to continue our product line. Check out our site regularly, or sign up for our newsletter to receive updates.

settings.title: Do you test on animals?
settings.answer: We do not! Our products are cruelty-free + vegan.

settings.title: What's your return policy?
settings.answer: All products must be returned in unused condition in their original packaging within 30 days of receiving the order.

settings.title: Do you ship worldwide?
settings.answer: Yes! We are pleased to announce that we now have worldwide shipping. You may experience longer delivery times when shipping to remote areas.

settings.title: Can I exchange my product?
settings.answer: If you want to exchange your product, please reach out to our customer service team to provide further details and set up the return and exchange.

settings.text: We aim to respond to all emails within 24-48hrs.

settings.title:
Real Reviews.
Real Results.

settings.text: We use cookies on our website to give you the very best shopping experience we can. By using this site, you agree to its use of cookies.

settings.title: INTRODUCING EVENPRIME
settings.text:
EVENPRIME is a modern personal care company from Santa Monica, California. We worked with leading chemists in Korea, the global epicenter of skincare innovation, to bring you a high-quality line of affordable products designed for men and women of all skin types.

Our gentle, dermatologist-approved formulas are comprised of carefully selected, vegan ingredients that deliver immediate relief, lasting results, and feel-good textures. No dishonesty, no toxic chemicals—we are the next generation of skincare.

settings.title: MADE BY REAL HUMANS, ON EARTH
settings.text:
During time spent living and working abroad in Asia, founder, Koh Kim, noticed the rest of the world lagged behind Korea and Japan when it came to innovation, quality and education in the skincare sector. She wondered, “What can we do to make better skincare science and ingredient trends from Asia more accessible to young people back home?”

As skincare connoisseur battling dull, tired, stressed skin, she set out to create an ingredients-first product line developed in conjunction with the community. And thus, EVENPRIME was born—granting you direct access to the latest cosmetic technologies and skincare innovations from Asia.

settings.title: SUITABLE FOR ALL SKIN TYPES
settings.text:
Known for groundbreaking ingredients, clever packaging and scientific advancements, the Korean skincare industry is widely considered to be a decade ahead of the Western market. Insider access to this technology allows us to offer you reasonably-priced, effective solutions that keep you looking selfie-ready without the need for complicated routines.

EVENPRIME products are suitable for all skin types—including sensitive, oily and acne-prone skin. Our simple, no-nonsense formulas contain only clean, ethical (vegan) ingredients, and can be used by (or shared with) any race, gender or celestial being.

settings.title: FAMILIAR YET SOMEWHAT ALIEN
settings.text:
As children of the ’90s, we were raised on (and motivated by) the Asian pop cultural wave that swept across America—from Cowboy Bebop to Dragonball Z to Evangelion to Wong Kar Wai’s 2046.

In setting out to build EVENPRIME, we always knew we wanted to imbue the brand with some form of anime-inspired nostalgia. After all, so many of us seem to share this source of inspiration.

With brands like Louis Vuitton and Prada now pulling from the worlds of anime and video games, we felt it was time to add our voice to the conversation.

settings.title: GOOD PLANETS ARE HARD TO FIND
settings.text:
Protecting the planet is one of our top priorities. Our packaging is made with FSC-certified paper from well-managed forests, our bottles and tubes are all recyclable, and our shipping process is optimized to lessen our carbon footprint. We also donate 1% of all revenue to ocean cleanup efforts around the world.

Together, we can build a brighter future for ourselves and our planet. What planet is this!? A damn good one. Let’s strive to keep it that way.

settings.title: KOH KIM
settings.text:
CEO / Founder

Currently Playing: Shadow of the Colossus
After years of struggling with stressed and irritated skin, our founder, Koh Kim, found a way to transform her skin - and is here to help you do the same.
Developed by industry-leading skincare formulators in Korea, our skincare products deliver selfie-ready skin with clean, science-backed ingredients.
Skincare is for everyone, so we work with our community to develop and test all of our current and future products.

settings.newsletter_richtext: Snag 10% off your next order when you sign-up for our newsletter. We promise to only send interesting e-mails.
